name: Dice Pouch
description:
THIS IS DICE POUCH!

This app is perfect for any tabletop session that requires a D4, D6, D10, D12 and/or D20.

FEATURES

Multiple skins for dice and background.

Randomized dice sfx pitch to make it as realistic as possible.

Automatic rerolls for dice that need them.

Dice limitations to avoid frying devices:

  • Windows and WebGL: 60 dice.
  • Android: 30 dice.
